item.title: Help him!! Help your code reviewer.
item.description: Photo by AltumCode on Unsplash Recently, I did a talk about Git to colleagues from my new work. The objective was to pass my learnings about Git to them. I learned a lot of Git in my last company. Not just commands but how to make our life easy when we do code review. The main goal of this post is what you can do to make easy the life of your code reviewer.
